# The figure on upper bounds on the total variation distance between the marginal distribution of the chain 3 at iteration t and the target distribution nu (made of two plots) is generated by mixing.R.

# The figure on computational time (in seconds) for 100 iterations of the Gibbs sampler (made of two plots) is generated by computational_scaling.R.
